name: Aura Clearing, Chakra Balancing, Energy Healing & Meditation
description:
Come visit our energy healing and
EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF ENERGY HEALING!

Aura Clearings, Chakra Balancing and Energy Healings are offered:
Every Wednesday evening 6 - 7 pm  
in the Belmar Area
Inside Irongate Executive Plaza
777 S Wadsworth Blvd, Bldg 2 #108
Lakewood, CO 80226
At the intersection of Wadsworth & Ohio
Our phone number is 720-413-7303

How an Aura Clearing, Chakra Balancing and Energy Healing works:

Aura Clearing cleans out energies that deplete joy and block growth. It's like an energy car wash, you’ll leave feeling energized and rejuvenated after a short healing session.

Chakra balancing aligns the spiritual body which increases clarity, vitality, and access to guidance. Whether feeling ill or well, anyone can receive a healing, anytime.

Healings generally take about 10 to 15 minutes.
No appointment necessary - just drop in. 

We will offer a FREE Energy Healing to any first time visitors.
 
This healings are offered for only $5 per person. Investing $5 in your well-being and peace of mind is much cheaper than the medical bills that could add up from not letting go of the negative energy that is blocking you from growth and stopping you from creating the life you desire.  

To watch a short video demonstrating on what an Aura Clearing, Chakra Balancing and Energy Healing looks like please visit   www.youtube.com/anitadestino 

Would you like take you’re healing to the next level?

We also offer training and guidance, for all levels with Guided Meditations, Angel Healings, Meditation Classes, Intuitive Readings, Pet Energy Healings and more. These events will have an investment for the healings.

Facilitated by
I am Anita Destino, www.AnitaDestino.com , ATP ®, Founder of Journey Within, Inspirational Spiritual Teacher, Professional Intuitive Reader and Energy Healer in Lakewood, CO.  I’d like to welcome you to our meetup group and to attend any of our energy healings, meditation classes or experience an intuitive reading.  Learn more at www.AnitaDestino.com .

Journey Within is a Center for Spiritual Growth and Developing Your Intuition located in Lakewood and Denver, Colorado.

How To Get to Journey Within– We are easy to find
From Wadsworth & 6th Avenue:
Go South on Wadsworth Boulevard, approximately 1.84 miles to Ohio Avenue, (2nd light after Alameda Avenue), turn West / right onto Ohio Avenue, turn right into the parking lot. We are in building #2 suite #108.

Inside Irongate Executive Plaza
777 S Wadsworth Blvd, Bldg 2 Suite 108
Lakewood, CO 80226
At the intersection of Wadsworth & Ohio
Our phone number is  720-413-7303
Journey Within's Website

See you soon!

This group is open to everyone.

organizer.name: Anita Destino
organizer.bio: I am, Anita Destino, Founder of Journey Within, a safe place for people interested in creating change in their lives. We focus on spiritual growth, developing your intuition and personal development in Denver, CO. For more info www.anitadestino.com
